snippet.title: COVENANT - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Covenant is a first-person dark fantasy combat game in which you play as a messenger sent from above. Wield martial arts, secret magic, and ancient weapons to explore and conquer a vast interconnected world.

Greater Things Are Coming.


Wishlist now on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3333990/Covenant/
Learn more at LegionStudio.dev




Should you wish to embark on this journey with us...

Join the Covenant Discord:  https://discord.gg/YY9abQ8E8N
X: https://x.com/legiongamedev
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legion.gamestudios
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/legionstudio
